overview: Sofía, a recently graduated Bachelor of Arts, returns to Peru and begins the search for a mysterious painting with the image of an angel. Her intuition takes her to Machu Picchu where she meets Matías, an enigmatic western doctor who has adopted shamanic techniques and the use of hallucinogenic herbs such as ayahuasca to cure drug addicts in a rehabilitation center. A magic and strange attraction surrounds them, however they must preserve their love by protecting it from the memory of Amaru, Matías ex-wife, and Sofia's unusual experiences.
title: Cuando el cielo es azul
